creator: serch@acme.com

text:
What compiler and linker are you using to compile the sources? It seems 
that you're using a mis-configured version of GCC (configured to run with 
GNU binutils, but actually running the solaris version of LD)
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
> Hi, how shoud I configure my GCC???
> any ideas?

I downloaded both GCC and GNU binutils from http://www.sunfreeware.com,
installed them, made sure that /usr/local/bin is in my PATH BEFORE
/usr/ccs/bin and compiled both Apache and WebApp... And it works...

    Pier

In fact that way it compiled, and it's ruuning
Thanks a lot!
creator: serch@acme.com
